scripts.dev: npm run build:types && npm run build:lib && concurrently -n core-types,ui-types,core,ui,docs,playground -c gray,gray,blue,cyan,yellow,green "cd @plcl-core-types && npm run dev" "cd @plcl-ui-types && npm run dev" "cd @plcl-core && npm run dev" "cd @plcl-ui && npm run dev" "cd docs && npm run dev" "cd playground && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:types: concurrently -n core-types,ui-types "cd @plcl-core-types && npm run dev" "cd @plcl-ui-types && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:lib: concurrently -n core,ui "cd @plcl-core && npm run dev" "cd @plcl-ui && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:apps: concurrently -n docs,playground "cd docs && npm run dev" "cd playground && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:lib && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:types: cd @plcl-core-types && npm run build && cd ../@plcl-ui-types && npm run build
scripts.build:lib: cd @plcl-core && npm run build && cd ../@plcl-ui && npm run build
scripts.install:all: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -f package-lock.json */package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.format: npm run format:types && npm run format:lib && npm run format:docs
scripts.lint: npm run lint:types && npm run lint:lib && npm run lint:docs
scripts.verify:build: npm run build:types && npm run build:lib
